description: This file defines an interface for a composition buffer within the WPEFramework project, including nested classes and enumerations related to buffer management and data handling.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer
classes.description: An interface representing a frame buffer optimized for hardware use, providing methods for managing buffer planes and lifecycle.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer::IPlane
classes.description: Represents a plane within the composition buffer, providing access to data and layout details.

classes.name: ICompositionBuffer::IIterator
classes.description: Iterator for traversing multiple planes within the buffer.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments the reference count for the buffer object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements the reference count for the buffer object.

methods.name: Identifier
methods.description: Returns a unique identifier for the buffer.

methods.name: Planes
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the buffer's planes with a specified timeout.

methods.name: Completed
methods.description: Signals that the caller is done with the planes, optionally indicating if the content was modified.

methods.name: Render
methods.description: Marks the buffer for display scanout.

methods.name: Width
methods.description: Returns the width of the buffer in pixels.

methods.name: Height
methods.description: Returns the height of the buffer in pixels.

methods.name: Format
methods.description: Returns the pixel format/layout of the buffer.

methods.name: Modifier
methods.description: Returns a modifier indicating pixel arrangement for hardware optimization.

methods.name: Type
methods.description: Returns the data type of the buffer, such as DMA or raw.
